task.title: Navigating the Text Area
task.shortdesc: The right column displays the text of your document.

step.cmd: Scroll to the bottom of the text in the text area.
step.info: The text is separated into chapters, sections, or articles by the XML document (see related links below). The text area loads individual sections, so the whole document will not appear unless there are no text divisions in the XML document.

step.cmd: Click on "Next Chapter" or "Previous Chapter" to navigate through the document sections.
